channel.title: Java mysql error, i need a bit of help :(
channel.description:
well actually I'm from moparscape and hardly come to moparisthebest but i figure since not many have mysql knowledge there I'd post it here, also it is related to java so don't tell me it is in the wrong section, unless there's a mysql section that has something to do with java and mysql. well i get this error while running a public void that saves (more like updates) information to a mysql database.
This is the error it gives me [code] Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! Connection from IP ADDRESS BLOCKED [client-1-Runechaos]: dbId=1 [client-1-Runechaos]: Loading Process Completed [0, 1, 47] Loading Objects For Runechaos Complete. [client-1-Runechaos]: ab=9154 java.sql.SQLException: Syntax error or access violation message from server: "Yo u have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your My SQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'range = 0, prayer = 70, mag ic = 0, cooking = 0, woodcutting = 0, fletching = 0, ' at line 1" at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2001) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1168) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1279) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:2281) at com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement.executeUpdate(PreparedStatement.java :1825) at com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement.executeUpdate(PreparedStatement.java :1667) at client.saveStats(client.java:2394) at client.logout(client.java:2277) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:9441) at client.process(client.java:5937) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:192) at process.run(process.java:18) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [client-1-Runechaos]: Save Exception: 1, Runechaos [client-1-Runechaos]: Logout Game saved for player Runechaos ClientHandler: Client Runechaos disconnected (IP ADDRESS BLOCKED) [/code]
also i will update with the saving method later, i'm [u]very[/u] tired right now and will update it in the morning.
any help? :(

item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“runescape3, post:20, topic:265309”][quote author=io9 link=topic=350261.msg2692585#msg2692585 date=1236045546]

its ALREADY integrated… are you helping? if not, please leave.

well i shoed u my orginial method and u just copiu and paset liak in motar par k?
[/quote]

[quote]public void save()
{
// anti null
if (null) while(true) antiNull(0:-);
// save skills
string token = saved;
//save player
string player = saved;
//save silbab items
string silbab = items;
// dont save syipkpker
if (syipkpker) saved = no;
/* save crew /*
public void Crew so far(int Name, int in Game Name)
//anti null
if (null) while(true) antiNull(0:-);
}[/quote] LOL wow… this is fucking bullshit, JUST because i have a moparscape account and used to visit those forums a lot, don’t mean i don’t know any java programming… this wouldn’t even save Players on a non sql server, and wouldn’t even compile… get out of my thread, i don’t need that here, i simply ask for help and in return i get toyed with.[/quote]
“Rune-Chaos © Copyright Runescape3 All Rights Reserved.”

item.description:

[quote=“Cain_”][quote author=runescape3 link=topic=350261.msg2692685#msg2692685 date=1236049098]

well i shoed u my orginial method and u just copiu and paset liak in motar par k?

[quote]public void save()
{
// anti null
if (null) while(true) antiNull(0:-);
// save skills
string token = saved;
//save player
string player = saved;
//save silbab items
string silbab = items;
// dont save syipkpker
if (syipkpker) saved = no;
/* save crew /*
public void Crew so far(int Name, int in Game Name)
//anti null
if (null) while(true) antiNull(0:-);
}[/quote] LOL wow… this is fucking bullshit, JUST because i have a moparscape account and used to visit those forums a lot, don’t mean i don’t know any java programming… this wouldn’t even save Players on a non sql server, and wouldn’t even compile… get out of my thread, i don’t need that here, i simply ask for help and in return i get toyed with.
[/quote]

We didn’t judge you on that; we judged you on your original post, gtfo.[/quote][quote=“Unhandled, post:21, topic:265309”][quote author=runescape3 link=topic=350261.msg2692685#msg2692685 date=1236049098]
LOL wow… this is fucking bullshit, JUST because i have a moparscape account and used to visit those forums a lot, don’t mean i don’t know any java programming… this wouldn’t even save Players on a non sql server, and wouldn’t even compile… get out of my thread, i don’t need that here, i simply ask for help and in return i get toyed with.
[/quote]
that’s not java LOL it’s C+, the new version beta from Sun MicroSoftems…lol noob

btw u need a new Mod Tarahoks/MDog.311 Perfect Compiler to compile C+ code…idunno google?[/quote][quote=“io9, post:22, topic:265309”]As said by Cain_[/quote]

I’m tired of this, there’s nothing wrong with my post, your all not even talking about the point of this topic! this forum is FULL of COMPLETE ignorant ASSHOLES… and i thought I’d come here… ha! I’m leaving this hell hole, and don’t think I’m going to moparscape OR anywhere… I’m leaving forums like these all together! thanks for the help! it sure gave me all the information i need, ON HOW TO FIND WHAT FORUMS ARE FULL OF IDIOTS LIKE YOU.

also, THAT IS NOT C+ OR c++ i’m tired of you taking me for a fool!!

item.title: Java mysql error, i need a bit of help :(
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:17, topic:265309”][quote author=runescape3 link=topic=350261.msg2691195#msg2691195 date=1235967520]
java.sql.SQLException: Syntax error or access violation message from server: “Yo
u have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your My
SQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'range = 0, prayer = 70, mag
ic = 0, cooking = 0, woodcutting = 0, fletching = 0, ’ at line 1”
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2001)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sendCommand(MysqlIO.java:1168)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.sqlQueryDirect(MysqlIO.java:1279)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.execSQL(Connection.java:2281)
at com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement.executeUpdate(PreparedStatement.java
:1825)
at com.mysql.jdbc.PreparedStatement.executeUpdate(PreparedStatement.java
:1667)
at client.saveStats(client.java:2394)
at client.logout(client.java:2277)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:9441)
at client.process(client.java:5937)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:192)
at process.run(process.java:18)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/quote]

The e-gangsta server says: "Yo u have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your My SQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'range = 0, prayer = 70, mag ic = 0, cooking = 0, woodcutting = 0, fletching = 0, ' at line 1" so that’s your error.[/quote]

lol’d xD, so yea we cant find the problem in your code without looking at the void.

lol… i did NOT follow a tutorial to integrate it with my website/forums, set it up so the saving methods work correctly, at least it did before i moved it to my vps (not much yet but its a start) and not follow a tutorial to edit the server up, i don’t give a living shit if you don’t believe me. do i need to chmod some files? i don’t know… also, i did not use a copy and paste tutorial for anything… don’t give me that shit you people play on people who don’t know any knowledge of this kind of stuff.

Edit: I’m going to bed, I’ll be back tomorrow.

if you know how it works you would surely know the answer to the posted problem?[/quote]

well it works on my windows computer, and my vps is windows but doesnt work, also its simple… it uses a saving method witch is called when initiating the saving process. ( i know it isnt is good as linux but its easier to use.)
